aboutModal.title: About Superhero DEX
aboutModal.info: Information about the library and service versions used within Superhero DEX

swap.transactSettingsPopup: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
swap.transactDeadlinePopup: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this period of time.
swap.permissionToolTip: You must give the DEX smart contracts permission to use your {msg}.
swap.allowDEX: Allow the DEX Protocol to use your {token}

confirmSwapModal.title: Confirm Swap
confirmSwapModal.spendNoMore: You will spend no more than
confirmSwapModal.priceImpactWarning: Due to the high price impact and the low slippage this transaction has little to no chance to be successfully executed

pool.liquidityPopup: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
pool.dontSeePool: Don't see a pool you've joined?

confirmLiquidityModal.estimation: You will receive at least {0} and at least {1} or the transaction will revert.
confirmLiquidityModal.outputEstimated: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {0}% your transaction will revert.

importPool.title: Import Pool
importPool.importTip: Use this tool to find pools that don't automatically appear in the interface.
importPool.selectBothTokens: Select both tokens to find your provided liquidity.
importPool.poolFound: Your pool share was imported successfully!
importPool.imported: The liquidity is imported, you can go back to see your provided liquidity in the main pool screen
importPool.footerText: You have no provided liquidity for the selected tokens

connectWalletModal.title: Connect a wallet
connectWalletModal.disclaimer: By connecting a wallet, you agree to DEX {0} and acknowledge that you have read and understand the DEX {1}.
connectWalletModal.onWalletConnectTimeout: Connection to SDK has been timeout, please try again later.

submitTransactionModal.confirm: Confirm this transaction in your wallet

onboardingModal.headline: Hey!
onboardingModal.body: Thanks for trying out the DEX! We are still working hard to improve it in all aspects, so you might run into some minor issues when using a mobile device. To find out more about solutions for common problems please visit this link:

tokenSelector.expandedInactiveTokenLists: Expanded results from inactive Token Lists
tokenSelector.importSpecificTokensOrManageCustoms: Tokens from an active lists. Import specific tokens below or click manage to add custom tokens.
tokenSelector.tokenImportCardDescription: This token doesn't appear on the active token list(s). Make sure this is the token that you want to trade.
tokenSelector.userCustomTokensManagerFooter: Custom tokens are stored locally in your browser

connectionStatus.offline: You are offline... Please check your connection.
connectionStatus.unableToConnectChosenNode: We are unable to connect to the chosen node.
connectionStatus.middlewareNotAvailable: Middleware is not available, some functionality may not work properly.
connectionStatus.middlewareOutOfSync: The middleware is out of sync, some functionality may not work properly.

connectWalletFindPool: Connect to a wallet to find pools
liquidityTip: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
customTokens: No Custom Tokens | {n} Custom Token | {n} Custom Tokens
